DESCRIPTION: Counts monsters currently summoned. Maximum of #b5 Summons.
#yOrb: At the start of turn, add #b1 #yMonster #yEgg to your hand. NL #yEvoke: Set the cost of #b1 random monster in your hand to 0.
#yResummoning a card plays a copy of it without charging #bEnergy or #bTributes. The new copy of the #yResummoned card is then sent to your #yGraveyard.
Removes X #ySummons. Unless you have enough #ySummons to #yTribute, you cannot play a #yTribute card.
Increase your maximum #ySummons by the number given.
#yOrb: At the start of turn, have a #b10% chance to increase all of your buffs by #b1. You have a #b70% chance if all monsters summoned are #ySpellcasters. NL #yEvoke: Gain #b1 #yBuffer.
#yOrb: #ySummon #b1 #ySpellcaster #yToken at the end of turn. NL #yEvoke: #yIncrement #b2.
#yOrb: Sets the cost #b1 random card in your hand to 0 when #yEvoked. At the start of each turn, increase the number of cards that will be reduced.
#yOrb: At the start of turn, gain #b2 #yDragonscales. NL #yEvoke: Sets the cost of #b1 random #yDragon in your hand to 1 for the turn.
When a card with #yOverflow is in your hand at the end of the turn, activate an effect. This effect has a limited amount of uses.
Can only be played if #yToon #yWorld is active. If you Tribute a Toon monster using another Toon, apply #b1 #yVulnerable to ALL enemies.
Tokens associated with the #yMagnet #yWarrior monsters. #yMagnets have no inherent effect.
Add #b2 #yRandomized cards to your hand. Gain #b1 random #ybuff. Apply #b2 random #ydebuffs to an enemy.
#yDragons have a #b15% chance to apply #yBurning to their targets. When you #yTribute a #yDragon for another #yDragon, gain #b2 #yDragonscales.
When you attack, if all the monsters you currently have summoned are #ySpellcasters, gain #b4 Block. You need to have at least #b1 #ySpellcaster summoned to trigger this effect.
When you #yTribute an #yInsect monster for another #yInsect, apply #b1 #yPoison to ALL enemies.
When you #yTribute a #yPlant monster for another #yPlant, apply #b1 #yConstricted to ALL enemies.

When you #yTribute a #yPredaplant monster for a #yPlant, apply #b2 #yConstricted to ALL enemies. NL When you #yTribute a #yPredaplant for another #yPredaplant, apply #b2 #yConstricted to ALL enemies and gain #b1 #yThorns. NL #yPredaplant monsters are treated as #yPlants.
#yOrb: At the start of turn, add #b1 #yRandomized #ySpell to your hand. NL #yEvoke: Set the cost of #b1 random #ySpell in your hand to 0.
#yOrb: At the start of turn, have a #b50% chance to #yChannel a random offensive #yOrb. You have a #b75% chance if all monsters summoned are #yDragons. NL #yEvoke: Increase your #yOrb slots by #b1.
#yOrb: Whenever you play a card, deal #b2 damage to a random enemy. Cannot damage #yBurning enemies. NL #yEvoke: Reduce the #yTribute cost of #yDragons (everywhere) by #b1 for the rest of combat.
#yOrb: At the start of turn, apply #b4 #yGrease to ALL enemies. NL #yEvoke: Fill your hand with random Tokens.
#yOrb: Whenever you #ySpecial #ySummon, deal #b3 damage to a random enemy. NL #yEvoke: Add #b1 copy of #yVampire #yFamiliar to your hand.
#yOrb: Whenever you trigger an #yOverflow effect, deal #b2 damage to ALL enemies. NL #yEvoke: Shuffle 2 random #yOverflow cards into your discard pile.
When you #yTribute a #yZombie for another #yZombie, gain #b1 #ySoul. Each time you #ySpecial #ySummon a #yZombie, lose #b1 #ySoul. #yZombies cannot be #ySpecial #ySummoned unless you have #ySouls.
When you #yTribute a #yFiend for another #yFiend, place #b1 card from your discard pile into your hand.
#yAqua cards have a #b15% chance to apply #yDamp to their targets. When you #yTribute an #yAqua for another #yAqua, increase the #ySummons of all monsters in your hand by #b1 for this turn.
#yRandomized cards may have their costs changed, #yTribute costs reduced, #ySummons increased, may #yExhaust, and may become #yUpgraded or #yEthereal.
Cannot be #ySpecial #ySummoned.
#yOrb: Whenever you #yTribute, apply #b1 #yBurning to a random enemy. NL #yEvoke: Deal #b3 damage to ALL enemies. Evoke damage increases each time you or any enemy receives damage from #yBurning.
#yOrb: Whenever you #yExhaust a card, #yEvoke another random orb. NL #yEvoke: For each orb Evoked by this orb's passive effect, gain #b2 Energy at the start of the next turn.
#yOrb: At the start of turn, gain #b2 #yDexterity until the end of turn. NL #yEvoke: Apply #b5 #yGrease to the enemy with the highest HP.
#yOrb: Whenever you #yIncrement, deal #b2 damage to ALL enemies. NL #yEvoke: Deal #b4 damage to a random enemy for each card in your hand.
#yOrb: At the start of turn, activate the #yMillennium #yPuzzle. NL #yEvoke: Choose #b1 of 20 #yRandomized cards from the current card pool to add to your hand.

#yOrb: Whenever you #yDetonate, gives #b3 #yBlock. Whenever you #ySolder, deals #b3 damage to ALL enemies. NL #yEvoke: If it is your turn, choose to #yDetonate or #ySolder #b2. Otherwise, #yDetonate #bX.
#yOrb: At the start of turn, apply #b1 #yPoison to ALL enemies. NL #yEvoke: Gain #b1 #yThorns.
#yOrb: At the start of turn, #yIncrement #b1. NL #yEvoke: Apply #yDamp to a random enemy for every #b3 of your max summons.
#yOrb: At the start of turn, apply #b4 #ySlow to a random enemy. NL #yEvoke: Apply #b8 #ySlow to ALL enemies.
#yOrb: Whenever you draw a monster, increase its damage by #b4. NL #yEvoke: Sum the energy and tribute cost of all cards in your hand. Deal damage to ALL enemies equal to #b2x this sum.
#yOrb: Add a #yRandomized Power card to your hand at the start of turn. NL #yEvoke: For the rest of combat, whenever you play a Power, channel #b2 Lightning.
#yInvert is the same as #yEvoke, except that you also #yChannel an Orb that is the 'opposite' of the one you #yEvoked.
Whenever you play a #yNaturia monster, gain #b1 #yVine. Whenever you #yTribute a #yNaturia for another, gain #b1 #yLeaf.
When you #yTribute a #ySuperheavy for another #ySuperheavy, gain #b1 #yDexterity.
#yMachines have a #b15% chance to apply #yGrease to their targets. Every other time you #yTribute a #yMachine for another #yMachine, gain #b1 #yArtifact.
#yOrb: At the start of turn, discard #b2 random cards from your draw pile. NL #yEvoke: Deal #b2 damage to ALL enemies for each card in your discard pile.
If an #yImmortal card is in the discard pile, gain [E] at the start of turn.
50% chance to trigger the action given after this keyword.
At the end of turn, gain #yBlock equal to the amount of #yMetallicize stacks you currently have.
Whenever an #yOverflow effect is triggered, buff the stats of this card for the rest of combat (wherever it is).
Power cards that enable #ySpellcaster synergy #yTribute effects. You can only have one #ySpellbook active at a time.
Considered to be ALL monster types (Aqua, Dragon, Fiend, Insect, Machine, Naturia, Plant, Predaplant, Rock, Spellcaster, Superheavy, Toon, Warrior, Wyrm, and Zombie).
Playing unique pieces of #yExodia will add #b1 to your #yExodia power.
Can be #yUpgraded more than one time.
Debuff that chooses a random type of card. For the rest of combat, all cards of this type cost #b0. Whenever you play a card of this type, trigger a random negative effect.
#yOrb: At the start of turn, draw #b1 card. NL #yEvoke: Draw #b2 cards. NL Water is unaffected by #yFocus.
#yOrb: No passive effect. NL #yEvoke: Gain #yStrength equal to a random enemy's #yStrength. NL Glass is unaffected by #yFocus.
#yOrb: At the start of turn, gain #b2 #yStrength until end of turn. NL #yEvoke: Apply #yVulnerable to a random enemy #b1 time(s).

#yGiants are powerful monsters with high costs and unique cost reduction effects that trigger from any pile in combat. When played, these cost reductions are reset. All #yGiants are #yExempt (not able to be #ySpecial #ySummoned).
#yOrb: At the start of turn, siphon #b2 #yTemporary #yHP from a random enemy. NL #yEvoke: Play #b1 Dark Hole.
#yOrb: At the start of turn, add #b1 random #yToken to your hand. NL #yEvoke: Set the cost of #b2 random monsters in your hand to 0 for the turn.
#yOrb: Whenever you #ySummon, gain #b2 #yBlock. NL #yEvoke: Draw and discard #b4 cards.

When you gain #yBlock via the #ySpellcaster effect, you gain additional #yBlock based on how much #yMagicka you currently have. NL NL #yMagicka resets to #b0 when you trigger it, and at the end of the turn is set to the number of #ySpellcasters you currently have summoned.
#yOrb: Whenever draw a #ySpell or #yTrap, #yUpgrade it. NL #yEvoke: #yUpgrade all cards in your hand.
#yOrb: At the start of turn, gain #b2 #yFocus until the end of turn. NL #yEvoke: Apply #yWeak to a random enemy #b4 times.
#yOrb: At the start of turn: draw #b1 card, gain #b4 #Temporary #yHP, and add #b1 #yRandomized #ySpell to your hand. NL #yEvoke: Cycles to the next Anticrystal effect at the end of each turn.
#yOrb: At the start of turn, have a #b5% chance to increase your #yMax #yHP by #b1. NL #yEvoke: Permanently enhances all your other channeled orbs by #b2.
#yOrb: Whenever you play a card, draw #b1 card and discard a random card. NL #yEvoke: Discard your hand and draw a card for each card discarded.
#yOrb: Whenever you draw a #ySummon monster, #yUpgrade it. NL #yEvoke: Deal #b10 damage to ALL enemies.
#yOrb: Whenever you draw a #yTribute monster, #yUpgrade it. NL #yEvoke: Gain #b10 #yBlock.
#yErupt effects are triggered on all cards in your hand whenever you #yEvoke any #yLava orbs.
The first time you #yTribute a #yWarrior for another #yWarrior each combat, choose any #yStance to enter.
While in this #yStance, you take #b40% more damage.
In this #yStance, #ySuperheavy cards have a low chance to apply #yPlated #yArmor or #yMetallicize when played.
In this #yStance, whenever you play a card, have a #b25% chance to reduce the cost of a random card in your hand by #b1 for the turn.
In this #yStance, #yBlock from cards is improved by #b3. Upon exiting this #yStance, gain #b1 #yDexterity.
When you enter this stance, gain #b1 #yBlur. Upon exiting this stance, gain #yBlock equal to your #yDexterity.
Upon exiting this stance, gain #yVigor equal to twice your #yDexterity.
In this #yStance, whenever you #yExhaust a card, #ySolder #b1. Whenever you #yBlock, randomize the amount of #yBlock you gain.
In this #yStance, whenever you #yExhaust a card, deal damage equal to your #yDexterity to ALL enemies.
In this #yStance, #yWarriors deal double damage and you cannot #yBlock.
At the end of each turn, gain #b2 #yBlock for each #yRock you have summoned.
The first time you #yTribute a #yWyrm for another each combat, double a random enemy's #yPoison.
The #b2nd #yBug you play each combat gives you #b5 #yTemporary #yHP.
#yCold-Blooded are #yStatus cards that #yRetain and reduce your max summons when #yRetained.
The #b3rd #ySpider you play each combat gives you #b7 #yTemporary #yHP.
At the end of turn, deal damage to ALL enemies equal to #b30% of #yVines times the number of #yNaturias currently summoned.

At the start of turn, if you have at least #b5 #yLeaves, you may choose to consume your #yLeaves and gain #yBlock. #yBlock amount depends on the number of #yLeaves you have and the number of #yNaturias currently summoned.
Has a #b50% chance to apply #yWeak to enemies that do not receive attack damage.
Has a #b33% chance to apply #yVulnerable to enemies that do not receive attack damage.
#yDebuff that deals damage to the owner at the start of even turns. On odd turns, #yBurning is increased by #b1 and has a #b25% chance to spread to other enemies.
#yFrozen characters take #b50% more damage and deal #b90% less damage for one turn.
Enemies have a #b33% chance to become #yVulnerable whenever a #yMalicious card is drawn.
#yDinosaurs deal #b10% more damage for each stack of #yWeak on their targets.
#yBlock and damage of #yDragons is increased by #b1 for every #b4 #yDragonscales you have.
Whenever an Attack deals unblocked damage, apply #yPoison equal to your #yEnvenom.
Cannot be #ySoldered. Cannot have its magic number modified by Duelist card effects.
#ySlowed characters take #b10% more damage for each stack of #ySlow. Playing cards adds #b1 #ySlow to ALL #ySlowed characters. Resets at the start of each turn.
Improves the effect of #ySoldering.
#yElectricity improves the magic number of your cards.
#yFishscales improves the #ySummons of your cards.
#yBlood reduces the #yTribute cost of your cards.
#yTribute the given number of #rExplosive #rTokens, triggering the explosive damage effect on random enemies instead of yourself. #yDetonated tokens are replaced by Bomb Casing tokens.

Improve the #bmagic #bnumber of #b1 card in your hand by the given amount. Cards with negative effects tied to magic numbers will have their values decreased by #ySolder effects. #bMagic #bnumbers are used to hold dynamic card values for almost anything that is not damage or #yBlock. For example, most cards that draw cards and use a number to indicate how many cards to draw are modifiable with #ySolder effects.
At the start of your turn, #yGreased characters gain #ySlow equal to their #yGrease. If #yBurning, take damage equal to the sum of #yBurning and #yGrease.

Cards with this keyword will trigger a Quicktime Event when played, and will activate their given effects depending on your performance in the event. If you disable Quicktime Events (QTE) from the config menu, Quicktime effects will trigger as if they are #yRoulette effects.
Draw X cards. If any cards drawn have #yOverflows remaining, trigger their #yOverflow effects.
Look at the top X cards of your draw pile. You may discard any of them. Gain #b2 #yTemporary #yHP for each #yAqua card discarded.
When drawn, has a #b30% chance to give you #b1 #yTemporary #yHP for each card in your discard pile.
Has a #b20% chance to #yChannel a #yWater orb when drawn.
Has a #b30% chance to #yTsunami #b1 when drawn. #yTsunami draws the given amount of cards, and triggers the #yOverflow effect of all applicable cards that are drawn this way.
Discarded from your hand whenever you play a card without #yCardinal.
#yDamp characters take damage whenever an #yOverflow effect is triggered.
Your next Attack deals additional damage, or your next Skill grants additional #yBlock.
#ySouls allow you to #ySpecial #ySummon #yZombies. Gain #ySouls by #yTributing #yZombies for other #yZombies.

Choose and remove X #yZombies from your deck and add them to your #yEntombed pile. At the start of each turn, if you have 3+ #ySouls, you may choose to #ySpecial #ySummon any of up to 5 random cards from your #yEntombed pile, which will remove it from the pile for the rest of combat (aka #yRevive #b1). You may not #yEntomb multiple copies of the same card. NL Note: #yEntomb effects do not use magic numbers.
Pay #b3 #ySouls to #ySpecial #ySummon X random cards from your #yEntombed pile (up to 5). The #yRevived cards are removed from your #yEntombed pile for the rest of combat.
#yZombies deal an additional #b3 damage for each #yUndead card in your #yGraveyard.
Whenever a card is #ySpecial #ySummoned, a copy is sent to your #yGraveyard.
Each time you play #b10 #yVampires, siphon #b5 #yTemporary #yHP from ALL enemies.
Each time you play #b3 #yMayakashis, apply a random #b2 turn debuff to a random enemy.
Each time you play #b5 #yShiranui, gain #b1 #yDexterity.
Each time you play #b10 #yGhostrick, #ySpecial #ySummon a random monster from your #yGraveyard on a random enemy.
Each time you play #b5 #yVendread, gain #b1 #yStrength.
Whenever you #ySpecial #ySummon, buff the stats of this card for the rest of combat (wherever it is).
Choose X #yZombies from your hand, then choose #b1 of #b3 random bonuses. Apply the chosen bonus to all selected cards.
At the end of turn, all #ySpirit monsters and Tokens are removed from your summon list.
#yOrb: At the start of turn, deal #b4 damage to ALL enemies, gain #b1 #yEnergy and #b5 #yBlock. NL #yEvoke: Effect cycles to the next Gate effect at the end of each turn (but with double the power).
If you have a max stack of #ySummons when a summoning #yBeast is played: #yIncrement #b1 before summoning.
While you have a #yFeral card in hand, all #ynon-Beast cards cost #b2 more #yTributes.
While you have a #yTerritorial card in hand, all other cards cost #b2 times as many #yTributes.
If you have not played any cards this turn, #yApex cards cost #b0 #yTributes. All #yApex cards are #yExempt (not able to be #ySpecial #ySummoned).
If played when you have #yStrength, trigger the given effect at the end of your turn.
At the start of turn, gain #b1 #yStrength for the turn for each #yFang you have, then lose #b5 #yFangs.
Buff that increases the damage of #ySpells for the rest of combat.
If you took unblocked attack damage last turn, trigger the given effect.
At the end of your turn, #yTribute ALL #yGusto monsters that are not #ySpellcasters. NL When you #yTribute a #yGusto monster, gain #b1 #yBlock.
#ySpecial #ySummoning a card plays a copy of it without charging #bEnergy or #bTributes. The copy is then sent to your #yGraveyard.
